item.title: SOL Treasury Corp increased its holdings by 1565 SOL, bringing the total position to 14194 SOL.
item.description: On August 19th, the wholly-owned subsidiary SOL Treasury Corp of the French publicly listed company Acheter-Louer.fr increased its holdings by 1565 SOL. As a result, its total holdings reached 14194 SOL, which is approximately worth 2.7 million US dollars.

item.title: Hyperbeat launches aggregator Masterswap
item.description: On August 19th, the native reward layer of the Hyperliquid ecosystem, Hyperbeat, launched the aggregator Masterswap.

item.title: A trader faced a partial liquidation of their position due to a market downturn, resulting in a total loss of approximately $4.3 million.
item.description: On August 19th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, due to the market downturn, trader General Gordon James has undergone partial liquidation. His total loss on Hyperliquid is approximately $4.3 million.Current Positions: 3,770 ETH ($15.8 million), 4,592 SOL ($816,000).

item.title: Yesterday, the U.S. Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $1.966 billion, while the Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $1.217 billion.
item.description: On August 19th, based on the data from Farside Investors, yesterday the net outflows of the US Ethereum spot ETF and the Bitcoin spot ETF were $1.966 billion and $1.217 billion respectively.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen $401 million in liquidations, with over 100,000 people being liquidated.
item.description: On August 19th, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, a total of $401 million in liquidations occurred across the entire network. Among them, there were $305 million in long liquidations and $96 million in short liquidations. A total of 106,345 people were liquidated. The largest single liquidation order took place on Bitmex - XBTZ25, with a value of $7.825 million.

item.title: 「$125k Long ETH Liquidation」 Whale Once Again Reduces Position by 1300.47 ETH, Liquidation Price Around $4,177
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "12.5K Liquidation Long on ETH" whale once more decreased their position by 1300.47 ETH. The liquidation prices for both positions are currently approximately $4,177.

item.title: Bitwise CEO: Banks Will Be Key Catalyst for Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency Adoption
item.description: On August 19th, Hunter Horsley, the CEO of Bitwise, stated that "Banks will serve as a key catalyst in propelling the new chapter in the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency space."

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $4200
item.description: On August 19th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum fell below $4200, experiencing a 24-hour decline of 2.6%.

item.title: "Buddy Big Brother" Huang Lizhong's long position is now floating at a loss of nearly 10 million US dollars
item.description: August 19th. Based on LookOnChain's monitoring, with the market decline, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng's long positions in ETH, BTC, HYPE, and PUMP are now facing a total loss of approximately 10 million USD.

item.title: The address was liquidated for 907.7 WETH when ETH retraced to around $4,200.
item.description: On August 19th, as per PeckShield's monitoring, when ETH was testing the $4,200 level, a particular address 0xbf2b...15bd was liquidated for 907.7 WETH (approximately $3.9 million).Presently, the address holds 633.6 WETH and 21.3 WBTC and is borrowing stablecoins worth $3.6 million.
